device.overview: A photography-centric smartphone featuring a massive 1-inch sensor and Leica optics for enthusiasts.

specs.label: Display
specs.description: A 12-bit color depth panel with 3000 nits peak brightness for incredible HDR content.

specs.label: Camera
specs.description: Features a variable aperture main lens and dual-telephoto periscope cameras.

specs.label: Battery
specs.description: High-density battery with 90W fast charging and 80W wireless charging.

specs.label: RAM
specs.description: Optimized for heavy image processing and computational photography.

specs.label: Storage
specs.description: Maximum storage capacity for professional 8K RAW video and thousands of photos.
